metadata.synopsis: The players interacts with the old wardrove of the Emperor, inside the private room at Elfsong tavern. AD about how the Emperor changed.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Inside the private room at Elfsong Tavern, players need to interact with the Emperor's WardroveS_LOW_Elfsong_EmperorWardrobe_aa5db69a-19b3-4ef2-b8a5-910d1ae7c6da

0.text: My old wardrobe - the home of all my disguises. We are what we appear to be, and so appearances matter.
